name: how-to-be-a-hero
description: CSS compiler for the HowToBeAHero system

scripts.build:css: node -e "const { existsSync } = require('fs'); const { spawnSync } = require('child_process'); const path='src/scss/how-to-be-a-hero.scss'; if (!existsSync(path)) { console.log('Skipping CSS build: '+path+' not found'); process.exit(0); } const res = spawnSync('sass',[path,'css/how-to-be-a-hero.css','--style=expanded','--no-source-map'],{stdio:'inherit'}); process.exit(res.status ?? 0);"
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run pack

author: Asacolips
